import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import LoadingBox from "../components/LoadingBox"; import MessageBox from "../components/MessageBox"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { modelCars, yearCars } from "../actions/carActions"; export default function VehicleDetailsForm(props) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { handleChange, checkoutForm } = props; const carModelList = useSelector((state) => state.carModelList); const carYearList = useSelector((state) => state.carYearList); const { loadingModel, errorModel, carModels } = carModelList; const { loadingYear, errorYear, carYears } = carYearList; useEffect(() => { dispatch(modelCars()); dispatch(yearCars()); }, []); return (
